text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Bravo! Listen to the cheers! They're celebrating your victory!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: I am sure that in admiration, everyone will work hard to surpass you.

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: She has left a hoofprint of hope in the horse girl world. Thank you for that ride… and—

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Nothing can top you two. The best trainer and the best horse girl!
